channel.title: Gardens on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Gardens on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Seedy Politics
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: This time of the year is perfect for planting a garden, so it’s natural to hit your local store and buy a bunch of tomato seeds, perhaps some carrot seeds, and maybe you’re in the mood for some spice, so you add a couple of habanero seeds to the cart. Soon, you might plant these seeds in the ground, without even giving a second thought to the fact that you showed your support to the commercial seed industry.
